dkeep.logic.guards

Class SuspiciousGuard

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.MovingObject
      • dkeep.logic.guards.Guard
        • dkeep.logic.guards.SuspiciousGuard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SuspiciousGuard
extends Guard
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Suspicious Guard; a zealous and insecure guard that keeps checking his back in order to make sure he catchs the hero. Will randomly reverse his path.
    See Also:
